isempty.message: Value is required and can't be empty.

notbetweendocumentarray.message: the field "$FIELD$" is not valid: count='$COUNT$' min-occurs='$MINOCCURS$', max-occurs='$MAXOCCURS$'

emailaddressinvalid.message: the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address.

emailaddressinvalidformat.message: the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address.

emailaddressinvalidhostname.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%hostname%' is no valid hostname for email address '%value%').

emailaddressinvalidmxrecord.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%hostname%' does not appear to have a valid MX record for the email address '%value%').

emailaddressinvalidsegment.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%hostname%' is not in a routable network segment. The email address '%value%' should not be resolved from public network).

emailaddressdotatom.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%localPart%' can not be matched against dot-atom format).

emailaddressquotedstring.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%localPart%' can not be matched against quoted-string format).

emailaddressinvalidlocalpart.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%localPart%' is no valid local part for email address '%value%').

emailaddresslengthexceeded.message:
the field "$FIELD$" must be a valid e-mail address
		('%value%' exceeds the allowed length).

stringlengthtoolong.message: the field "$FIELD$" must have a maximum size of %max% characters.

stringlengthinvalid.message: the field "$FIELD$" must be a String

stringlengthtooshort.message: the field "$FIELD$" must have a minimum size of %max% characters.

notunique.message: the field "$FIELD$" must be have a unique value.

notmatch.message: the field "$FIELD$" must match the following format: %pattern%.

notgreaterthan.message: the field "$FIELD$" must have a minimum value of %min%.

notlessthan.message: the field "$FIELD$" must have a maximum value of %max%.

notbetween.message: the field "$FIELD$" must have a value between %min% and %max%.

notbetweenstrict.message: the field "$FIELD$" must have a value strictly between %min% and %max%.

hostnamecannotdecodepunycode.message: '%value%' appears to be a DNS hostname but the given punycode notation cannot be decoded

hostnamedashcharacter.message: '%value%' appears to be a DNS hostname but contains a dash in an invalid position

hostnameinvalidhostname.message: '%value%' does not match the expected structure for a DNS hostname

hostnameinvalidhostnameschema.message: '%value%' appears to be a DNS hostname but cannot match against hostname schema for TLD '%tld%'

hostnameinvalidlocalname.message: '%value%' does not appear to be a valid local network name

hostnameinvaliduri.message: '%value%' does not appear to be a valid URI hostname

hostnameipaddressnotallowed.message: '%value%' appears to be an IP address, but IP addresses are not allowed

hostnamelocalnamenotallowed.message: '%value%' appears to be a local network name but local network names are not allowed

hostnameundecipherabletld.message: '%value%' appears to be a DNS hostname but cannot extract TLD part

hostnameunknowntld.message: '%value%' appears to be a DNS hostname but cannot match TLD against known list

storageuriinvalid.message: '%value%' must be a valid storage URI.

publicationstatusinvalid.message: '%value%' must be a valid publication status.

newpublicationStatusInvalid.message: '%value%' is not  valid for new document.
